description: ESP32-S3 — Espressif dual-core Xtensa® LX7 MCU (up to 240 MHz) with integrated 2.4 GHz Wi‑Fi (802.11 b/g/n) and Bluetooth 5 (LE). Supports AI/vector instructions for neural-network acceleration, USB‑OTG, hardware security (secure boot, flash encryption), ~45 programmable GPIOs and a rich set of peripherals. See Espressif datasheet for full electrical and pin information.
package: QFN 7x7 (56-pin) — also available in LGA 7x7 SiP (PICO) module variants

links.description: Official ESP32-S3 product overview and features (Espressif).
